content.raw:
It could be a tiny bit confusing that the new standalone models are nested inside of `atlas_description`, i.e.

~~~
<install_prefix>/share/atlas_description/standalone_models/atlas_v3
~~~

depends on

~~~
<install_prefix>/share/atlas_description/meshes_v3
~~~

Would be nice to make the new `standalone_models` siblings of `atlas_description` and rename it as
~~~
<install_prefix>/share/drcsim_gazebo_standalone_models
~~~
